column9: reply_tweet_id
Oh... yeah. I got my new plates. But they mixed them up. Somebody got mine and I got their vanity plates. I'm Cosmo Kramer, the Assman!
You meet a proctologist at a party, don't walk away. Plant yourself there, because you will hear the funniest stories you've ever heard.
Every proctologist story ends in the same way: 'It was a million to one shot, Doc. Million to one.'
The key to eating a black and white cookie is that you wanna get some black and some white in each bite.
Nothing mixes better than vanilla+chocolate. Yet racial harmony eludes us. If we would only look to the cookie, our problems would be solved
I find pastrami to be the most sensual of all the salted, cured meats.
I'm not a lesbian. I hate men, but I'm not a lesbian.
Sex has taken place when the nipple makes its first appearance.
@AvisRental You better give me the insurance. Because I'm gonna beat the hell out of this car.
Anytime someone says, 'Ooh, this is so good - what's in this?' the answer invariably comes back, 'cinnamon.' Cinnamon. Again and again.
@elainebenes Breaking up is like knocking over a coke machine. Can't do it in one push, you got to rock it back and forth a few times.
Don't cast aspersions on someone for just wearing a cape. Superman wore a cape. I'll be damned if I'll let you say anything bad about him.
Elaine, you don't understand! This isn't plans 1 through 8. This is Plan 9. This is the one that worked. The worst movie ever made.
I can't sleep, I can't leave the house, I'm climbin' the walls. Meanwhile, I'm dating a virgin, I'm in this contest, something's gotta give!
I had a dream last night that a hamburger was eating me.
I think that's what's good for the goose is good for the gander. What's a gander? It's a goose that's had the ol' switcheroo pulled on it.
I'm not gay. Not that there's anything wrong with that.
Looking at #cleavage is like looking at the sun. You don't stare at it. It's too risky. Ya get a sense of it and then you look away.
People don't just bump into each other and have sex. This isn't Cinemax.
People with guns don't understand. That's why they get guns. Too many misunderstandings.
That... is one magic loogie.
The road less taken is less taken for a reason.
The thing about birthday parties is that the first birthday party you have and the last birthday party you have are actually quite similar.
I'll tell you a little secret about zip codes: they're meaningless.
Just remember, when you control the mail, you control... information.
Keith Hernandez! I despise that man!
My mail truck was just ambushed by a band of backwoods mail-hating survivalists.
The mail never stops. Just keeps coming and coming. Every day. Then the barcode reader breaks. Then it's Publisher's Clearinghouse day.
@ElaineBenes Just saw your dance from the office party. Sweet fancy Moses
A donation has been made in your name to the Human Fund
Alright, that's it for me, you've been great! Good night, everybody.
Divorce is always hard. Especially on the kids. 'Course I am the result of my parents having stayed together so ya never know.
Do you ever get down on your knees and thank God you know me and have access to my dementia?
Doing quite well. Yesterday lunch: a soft-boiled egg and a quickie. If I could add TV to the equation, that'd really be the ultimate.
Everybody's talkin' at me, I can't hear a word they're sayin'... Just drivin' around in @JonVoight's car...
George is gettin' upset!
Hi, my name is George, I'm unemployed and I live with my parents.
I don't know what it is about that mirror in that bathroom. I love the way I look in it... I feel like Robert Wagner.
I don't think I've ever been to an appointment in my life where I wanted the other guy to show up.
I flew too close to the sun on wings of pastrami.
I have a bad feeling that whenever a lesbian looks at me they think 'That's why I'm not a heterosexual.'
I lie every second of the day. My whole life is a sham.
I love the mirror in that bathroom. Don't know what the hell it is, I look terrific in that mirror. I feel like @RobertWagner in there
I work for #Kruger Industrial Smoothing, we don't care... and it shows.
I'm disturbed, I'm depressed, I'm inadequate, I've got it all!
I'm speechless. I have no speech.
I've driven women to lesbianism before but never to a mental institution.
The cat - mmrrrooowwwrr - is out of the bag!
They botched my vasectomy. I'm even more potent now.
Who's gonna turn down a #JuniorMint? It's chocolate, it's peppermint, it's delicious. It's very refreshing.
You got a big job interview, you're a little nervous. Throw back a couple shots of #Hennigans Loose as a goose and ready to roll in no time
Feels like an #Arby's night.
@thementee I'm sorry, but I can't be with someone whose mentor is a Costanza.
She's got a little Marissa Tomei thing goin' on.
@costanza81 Ah, too bad you've got a little George Costanza thing goin' on.
@elainebenes Are you sure you want to get married? I mean, it's a big change of life.
@jerry Jerry, it's 3 a.m. and I'm at a cock fight. What am I clinging to?
@cosmo Boy, you sure do have a lot of friends, how come I never see any of these people?
@jerry They want to know how come they never see you.
This isn't just my wallet. It's an organizer, a memory and an old friend.
@costanza81 Well, your friend is morbidly obese.
@jerry Well, at least I don't carry a purse.
@costanza81 It's not a purse, it's European.
@Puddy, this is a pretty good move for you, huh? No more 'grease monkey'.
@jerry I don't much care for that term. I don't know too many monkeys who could take apart a fuel injector.
@Puddy I saw one once that could do sign language.
@jerry Yeah, I saw that one. Uh... Koko. That chimp's alright. High-five.
@jerry I heard you went down to this woman's office and heckled her.
@ronnie Damn right. It's time we stopped being lapdogs. Who are they to heckle us? It's time one of us drew a line in the sand.
@jerry You're like Rosa Parks. You've opened a brand new door for all of us. I can't wait for the next time that somebody heckles me.
@ronnie Well, that shouldn't be long...
You're becoming one of the #glitterati.
@cosmo What's that?
@jerry People who glitter.
@cosmo So you're saying #UNICEF is a scam?
@jerry Perfect cover for a money laundering operation. No one can keep track of all those kids with the little orange boxes of change
Well, our rickshaw is gone. We strapped it to a homeless guy and he bolted.
Well, you know, 80% of all homeless rickshaw businesses fail within the first six months.
We should've got some collateral from him. Like his bag of cans, or his... other bag of cans.
She calls me up at my office, she says, 'We have to talk.'
@costanza81 Uh, the four worst words in the English language.
@jerry That, or 'Whose bra is this?'
@pam Her bouquet cleaved his hardened shell, and fondled his muscled heart. He imbibed her glistening spell, just before the other shoe fell
@cosmo, that is so lovely.
@cosmo Doing laundry, mending chicken wire, high tea with a Mr. Newman?
@dean_jones It may seem glamorous, but it's business as usual at #Kramerica. http://pkmeco.com/seinfeld/voice.htm
@cosmo Your entire enterprise is nothing more than a solitary man with a messy apartment that may or may not contain a chicken!
@dean_jones And with Darrin's help, we'll get that chicken!
@cosmo I'm sorry; there's just no way we can allow Darrin to stay with you.
@dean_jones Well, this decision seems capricious and arbitrary.
@cosmo Your fly's open.
Ugh, I hate people.
@elainebenes Yeah, they're the worst.
Oh, this is interesting... Jane's topless.
@jerry Yo yo ma.
@jerry Boutros Boutros Ghali...
@jerry Nice rack.
@derek_Jeter Hitting isn't about muscle. Simple physics: calculate velocity v vs trajectory t, gravity g a constant. It's not complicated.
@costanza81 Now, who are you again?
@derek_Jeter George Costanza, assistant to the traveling secretary.
@costanza81 Are you the guy who put us in that Ramada in Milwaukee?
@BernieWilliams Do you wanna talk about hotels, or do you wanna win some ball games?
@costanza81 We won the World Series.
@derek_Jeter @BernieWilliams Yeah ... in six games.
@jerry No one has ever successfully accomplished the Roommate Switch. In the Middle Ages you could get locked up for even suggesting it.
@costanza81 They didn't have roommates in the Middle Ages.
@jerry Well, I'm sure at some point between the years 800 and 1200, somewhere, there were two women living together.
@jerry It's the best.  It's gold, jerry. GOLD!
@bubble_boy MOOPS http://pkmeco.com/seinfeld/bubble.htm
@jerry I'm sorry, but I can't be with someone whose protégé is a hack.
@cushman Before that, I was in real estate. I quit because the boss wouldn't let me use his private bathroom. That was it.
@cushman My last job was in publishing. I got fired for having sex in my office with the cleaning woman.
@bigstein @costanza81 is one of the applicants: the complete opposite of every applicant we've seen.
@bigstein With all due respect, I find it very hard to see the logic behind some of the moves you have made with this fine organization
@bigstein We have watched you take our beloved EYankees and reduced them to a laughing stock, all for the glorification of your massive ego
@cushman Hire this man!
@costanza81 #belly Helllllooooo. La, la, la. http://pkmeco.com/seinfeld/voice.htm
If she can't find me, she can't break up with me.
It became very clear to me sitting out there today that every decision I've made in my entire life has been wrong.
Just remember, it's not a lie if you believe it. #advice
Just threw away lifetime of guilt-free sex+floor seats @ every #MSG event.So please, a little respect. For I am Costanza, Lord of the Idiots
My father was a quitter, my grandfather was a quitter, I was raised to give up. It's one of the few things I do well.
My life is the complete opposite of everything I want it to be. Every instinct I have, in every aspect of life -- it's all been wrong
That's why I don't have cable in my house. Because of that naked station. I'd never turn it off. Wouldn't sleep, Wouldn't eat.
If I had the naked station, they'd find me sitting there in my pajamas with drool coming down my face
She threw toupee out tbe window. Feel like my old self again. Neurotic, paranoid, totally inadequate, completely insecure. It's a pleasure
The sea was angry that day, my friends. Like an old man trying to send back soup in a deli.
There is no bigger loser than me!
This thing is like an onion: the more layers you peel, the more it stinks!
Who buys an umbrella anyway? You can get them for free at the coffee shop in those metal cans.
You can stuff your sorries in a sack, mister!
You know I always wanted to pretend I was an #architect.
You're killing independent George.
George, #festivus is your heritage!
I find tinsel distracting.
I have been performing feats of strength all morning.
I'm like the Phoenix, rising from Arizona.
Serenity now. SERENITY NOW! http://pkmeco.com/seinfeld/serenity.htm
The doll was destroyed. But out of that, a new holiday was born. A #FESTIVUS FOR THE REST-OF-US.
You have the rooster, the hen, and the chicken. The rooster goes with the chicken... So who's having sex with the hen?
Ham+cheese again. And no fancy mustard. I love that fancy mustard. You could put that fancy mustard on a shoe, it'd taste pretty good to me
I don't think there's any greater tragedy than when parents outlive their children.
You very bad man, Jerry. Very bad man.
The speak of a man so virile,so potent,to spend a night with such a man is to enter a world of sensual delights most women dare not of
Serenity now. Insanity later. http://pkmeco.com/seinfeld/serenity.htm
Of course the bra isn't going to fit on a leotard. A bra's got to go up against the skin. Like a glove.
This is the most public yet of my many humiliations.
@ElaineBenes You've tested positive for opium. That's right. White Lotus. Yam-yam. Shanghai Sally.
#baseballcamp ended a few days early. There was an incident. I punched Mickey Mantle in the mouth.
#newmervgriffin Well, we're talking to Elaine Benes, adult film star, on the set of her new movie 'Elaine Does the Upper West Side'
@Bob_Sacamano came here for a hernia operation. Oh, yeah, routine surgery. Now he's sitting in a chair by a window going 'My name is Bob!'
Boy, these pretzels are makin' me thirsty.
Celebration time. That coffee table book I wrote? Well, the company sold the movie rights to it. I'm officially retired.
Here's to feeling good all the time.
Hoochie Mama.
I'm at the corner of 1st and 1st... How can the same street intersect with itself? It must be at the nexus of the universe.
I'm on the Mexican, woah oh oh, radio.
If you'd have told me someday I'd solve the energy problem, I'd have said you're crazy. Now let's push this giant ball of oil out the window
If you're not gonna be a part of a civil society, then just get in your car and drive on over to the East Side.
It's a #Festivus miracle.
Jerry, I know myself. And if I'm on the streets, and it starts to go down, I don't back off, until its finished.
Just had a hot bowl of #mulligatawny: delightful Hindu concoction simmered to perfection by one of the great soup artisans of the modern era
That's right folks. Just had 3 shots of #Hennigan's, don't even smell, can go around drunk all day. Hennigan's: the no smell, no tell Scotch
Remember my idea about rickshaws in NY? We're gonna make it happen. Guy in the Hong Kong post office is shipping us a rickshaw. Can't miss.
See, this is what the holidays are all about. Three buddies sitting around chewing gum.
The carpet sweeper is the biggest scam perpetrated on the American public since One Hour Martinizing.
